reviews.text: I stopped by for lunch on a weekday while sightseeing. The atmosphere of the restaurant is nice, and all the pastas are delicious and highly recommended. The fish and chips were also fluffy and delicious. The prices are reasonable, so please stop by when you come to Sentosa Island.

Visit here 2 times with family , I am impressed with the customers service here . The staff name is Kim who serviced us with a great attitude, friendly, fast  caring and details to us even the restaurant were crowded on the Christmas lunch time. We do enjoy the lunch  very much . The pizza  and spaghetti is delicious.
Definitely will back again ðŸ˜Š

Food is good but 4 stars as chicken satay was double fried. Tiger beer draft was ok.

Decent atmosphere.

Not much of service offered as you lookup the menu and order on your phone. Finally you walk to the counter to pay the bill.

Quite expensive.

Peter is very professional and connects well with kids. My kids love him. He is kind and understanding towards the kids, and his kid meal recommendations are great for my kids. Harry's Resorts World Sentosa is perfect for family gatherings. People like Peter make this place amazing! Thank you for the amazing dining experience that you and your team provided.

Harry Resorts World Sentosa is truly stands out! This place is a must-visit in Sentosa area. The food boasts flavourful options. Pizza features a thin crust and crispy texture. Fish and Chips is generously portioned and reasonably priced. It pair well with Beer.Their kid meal is well-suited for young diners. They incorporated WOW Factor. Peter, their formal service provider, exemplified extraordinary kindness and professionalism, demonstrating the significant influence of even a small act of kindness. He proved to be exceptional with children and gained my parents' appreciation. Peter eschewed high-pressure sales techniques and provided comprehensive explanations of the menu. Even in a crowded restaurant, numerous customers specifically requested his service. He delivered outstanding service consistently to all patrons. We were extremely impressed. Thank you for providing insightful food recommendations. Peter undoubtedly positively impacts his brand. We left with full bellies and happy hearts.Harry should really proud for their menu merchandising.
